title-group.article-title: EXACT COUNTING OF D ℓ NUMBER FIELDS WITH GIVEN QUADRATIC RESOLVENT

abstract.p: We give efficient numerical methods for counting exactly the number of Dℓ number fields of degree ℓ with given quadratic resolvent, for calculating the constants occurring in their asymptotic expansions, and we give tables for typical cases.
